NCLCONVERTER
runtime_ - Float - Maximum Hours to Run (click here for help setting this correctly)
infile_ - Primary Input File
format_type_ - Excl - Choose the Input Format
data_type_ - Excl - Specify the Data Type (Mixed data types are not supported)
relaxed_type_ - Switch - My data is in a relaxed Phylip format
interleaved_type_ - Switch - My data is interleaved
nexus_strictness_ - Integer - Set the NEXUS strictness level (-s)
output_type_ - Excl - Choose the Output format (* values could produce multiple output files)
outfile_nexus_ - String - Please enter a prefix for your output file (default is "out")
all_output_ - Results -
